content: No matter which musical instrument you want to learn to play, the most important thing is not to make any mistakes from the beginning on, because mistakes are always imprinted on your mind more easily than everything you do right.
translations: ita:Non importa quale strumento musicale si vuole imparare a suonare, la cosa più importante è non commettere errori fin dal
credits: Sentence from Tatoeba by BraveSentry (CC-BY 2.0 FR)
